text:
The VSS GET command line provides support for wildcard patterns. Would be 
useful to replicate this feature in VSSGET to allow specific filetypes to be 
get'd.
Thanks
Mark
creator: mark.owens@coda.com

text:
I have also encountered this same bug - i have used the ssidchk.exe to verify 
that the login i am sending via login attribute and vssget tasks is correct.
creator: amit1s@yahoo.com
